content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi ;

if OBJECT_ID('bronze.calendar') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL table bronze.calendar 

create EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar (

        date_key        INT,
        date            DATE,
        year            SMALLINT,
        month           TINYINT,
        day             TINYINT,
        day_name        VARCHAR(10),
        day_of_year     SMALLINT,
        week_of_month   TINYINT,
        week_of_year    TINYINT,
        month_name      VARCHAR(10),
        year_month      INT,
        year_week       INT
) 
    with(
        location = 'raw/calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_pv1,
        reject_value = 10 ,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/calendar'


    ) GO

select * from bronze.calendar go
